hero.title: A digital assistant to better understand how you feel
hero.subtitle: MEDAGENTbyTREBLA guides you through intelligent symptom assessments, providing empathetic support and responsible medical guidance with advanced conversational AI.

features.title: Why Choose MEDAGENTbyTREBLA
features.subtitle: A revolutionary approach to symptom assessment that combines artificial intelligence, human empathy, and scientific rigor.

adaptive_intelligence.title: Adaptive Intelligence
adaptive_intelligence.description: Conversational AI that adapts to your profile and specific symptoms for personalized support.

empathetic_approach.title: Empathetic Approach
empathetic_approach.description: Human and understanding interactions that don't judge, but guide with sensitivity toward solutions.

guaranteed_privacy.title: Guaranteed Privacy
guaranteed_privacy.description: GDPR compliant with end-to-end encryption. Your health data is protected and never shared.

dual_output.title: Dual Output
dual_output.description: Responses for both you and healthcare operators, with appropriate language for each recipient.

benefits.title: Everything You Need
benefits.subtitle: MEDAGENTbyTREBLA is not just a medical chatbot, but a complete ecosystem for intelligent management of your digital health.

testimonials.title: What Professionals Say
testimonials.subtitle: MEDAGENTbyTREBLA is already used by doctors, educators, and families throughout Italy.

dr_maria.name: Dr. Maria Rossi
dr_maria.content: MEDAGENTbyTREBLA helps my patients better understand their symptoms before the visit, making consultations more effective.

giuseppe.name: Giuseppe Bianchi
giuseppe.content: Finally an assistant that doesn't make me panic when my child has some symptoms. Very useful for guidance.

prof_laura.name: Prof. Laura Verdi
prof_laura.content: I use MEDAGENTbyTREBLA to teach my medical students how to structure a patient-centered diagnostic approach.

cta.title: Ready to Take Care of Your Health?
cta.subtitle: Start your first free assessment with MEDAGENTbyTREBLA right now. No registration required, maximum privacy guaranteed.

evaluation.title: Guided Symptom Assessment
evaluation.subtitle: Answer the questions to receive personalized support from our AI assistant.

basic_info.title: Basic Information
basic_info.subtitle: Let's start by collecting some basic information to personalize your experience.

main_symptom.title: Main Symptom
main_symptom.subtitle: Describe the symptom that worries you most or brought you here.

associated_symptoms.title: Associated Symptoms
associated_symptoms.subtitle: Select all other symptoms you are experiencing (optional).

medical_history.title: Medical History
medical_history.subtitle: This information helps us provide more accurate and personalized advice.
medical_history.conditions_label: Known medical conditions (select all that apply)
medical_history.family_history_placeholder: e.g. diabetes in family, allergies, heart disease...

consent.title: Consent and Privacy
consent.subtitle: Before starting, please read carefully and accept the following consents.

medical_disclaimer.title: Important Medical Disclaimer
medical_disclaimer.content: MEDAGENTbyTREBLA is an educational support tool and does NOT replace professional medical advice. For medical emergencies contact 118 immediately. The information provided does not constitute medical diagnosis and should not be used as a substitute for qualified medical consultation.

informed_consent.title: Informed Consent *
informed_consent.content: I understand that MEDAGENTbyTREBLA is an AI assistant for educational and guidance purposes. I accept that it does not constitute professional medical advice and that for health problems I must consult a qualified doctor.

privacy_consent.title: Privacy and Data Processing *
privacy_consent.content: I accept the processing of my data according to the Privacy Policy. Data is pseudonymized, encrypted and automatically deleted after 30 days. No personally identifiable data is stored.

validation.consent_required: You must accept the informed consent
validation.privacy_required: You must accept the privacy policy

chat.title: Medical Consultation
chat.disclaimer: ⚠️ Responses are educational and do not replace professional medical advice

results.title: Assessment Results
results.subtitle: Here's the summary of your consultation with MedAgent

no_results.title: No Results Available
no_results.subtitle: You need to complete an assessment to see results.

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: We are a team of doctors, engineers and researchers who believe in the power of technology to democratize access to health guidance.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content1: In a world where access to medical care can be complex and expensive, MedAgent was born to bridge the information gap between citizens and the healthcare system.
mission.content2: We don't replace doctors, but complement them, offering first assessment tools that help people understand when and how to seek professional help.
mission.content3: Our vision is a future where every person, regardless of socio-economic background or geographic location, has access to intelligent, empathetic and scientifically based health guidance.

values.title: Our Values
values.subtitle: Every line of code we write is guided by solid ethical principles and the conviction that technology must serve humanity.

digital_empathy.title: Digital Empathy
digital_empathy.description: We create technology that understands and respects human emotions, offering compassionate support in moments of vulnerability.

privacy_by_design.title: Privacy by Design
privacy_by_design.description: Health data protection is integrated into every aspect of our system, not added as an afterthought.

responsible_ai.title: Responsible AI
responsible_ai.description: We use artificial intelligence ethically, transparently and always under qualified human supervision.

universal_accessibility.title: Universal Accessibility
universal_accessibility.description: We design for everyone: elderly, young, people with disabilities, migrants, families with different levels of digital literacy.

team.title: Our Team
team.subtitle: Passionate professionals who combine medical expertise, technical skills and ethical vision.

timeline.title: Our Journey
timeline.subtitle: From initial research to the product you use today: a timeline of our development.

technology.title: Cutting-edge Technology
technology.content1: MedAgent uses Gemini 2.0-flash, Google's most advanced language model, specialized for medical applications through fine-tuning on validated clinical datasets.
technology.content2: Our cloud-native architecture ensures scalability, security and performance, while machine learning algorithms analyze symptom patterns to provide increasingly accurate assessments.
technology.content3: Every interaction is protected by end-to-end encryption and data is processed according to the strictest European GDPR standards.

cta.title: Join the Digital Health Revolution
cta.subtitle: Try MedAgent today and discover how artificial intelligence can support your wellbeing in a safe, empathetic and scientifically based way.

footer.brand_description: An AI health assistant that guides you through intelligent symptom assessments, providing empathetic support and responsible medical guidance.
footer.made_with_passion: Made with passion for digital health
footer.important_notice: IMPORTANT: MEDAGENTbyTREBLA does not replace professional medical advice.
